name: regex-insight
description: Quickly generate example matches for your regular expressions with ease! This extension allows you to input a regex pattern and instantly receive a variety of matching examples. Perfect for developers looking to test regex patterns or better understand how they work, this tool enhances your productivity and improves your coding workflow.

scripts.compile: yarn run check-types && yarn run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: yarn run check-types && yarn run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: yarn run compile-tests && yarn run compile && yarn run lint
